channel.title: Phone Matiss on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Phone Matiss on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: Inclimate weather..
item.description: I remember when a friend of mine used to allude to my relationships as weather. He would ask how the weather was. I would always respond with some equally vague answer. It was fun. Today I went to watch breakdancing. It would have been fun, if it hadn’t been canceled. suxors. However. rigth before break dancing I talked to a new friend on the phone for quite awhile. It was nice.
